ProductData.DataName: VIIRS Ocean Color Chlorophyll Product Profile

Datum.Description: Concentration of chlorophyll in a vertical column of the surface layer in the ocean
Inherent Optical Properties - Absorption at 412nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Absorption at 445nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Absorption at 488nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Absorption at 555nm

Inherent Optical Properties - Backscattering at 412nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Backscattering at 445nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Backscattering at 488nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Backscattering at 555nm
Inherent Optical Properties - Backscattering at 672nm
Normalized Water Leaving Radiance at 412nm
Normalized Water Leaving Radiance at 445nm
Normalized Water Leaving Radiance at 488nm
Normalized Water Leaving Radiance at 555nm
Normalized Water Leaving Radiance at 672nm

Ocean Color Quality at 412nm (Indicates pixel level Normalized Water-Leaving Radiance quality at M1) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 412nm (M1-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

Ocean Color Quality at 445nm (Indicates pixel level Normalized Water-Leaving Radiance quality at M2) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 445nm (M2-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

Ocean Color Quality at 488nm (Indicates pixel level Normalized Water-Leaving Radiance quality at M3) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 488nm (M3-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

Ocean Color Quality at 555nm (Indicates pixel level Normalized Water-Leaving Radiance quality at M4) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 555 (M4-Band) nm nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

Ocean Color Quality at 672nm (Indicates pixel level Normalized Water-Leaving Radiance quality at M5) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 672nm (M5-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) The M5-Band RSR is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

Chlorophyll a Concentration Quality (Indicates pixel level chlorophyll a concentration quality) This flag is set to "Poor" if: (1) The Chlorophyll-a is out of the system spec range OR (2) Any band's IOP-a or IOP-s value is outside the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_a Quality at 412nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-a quality at M1) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 412nm nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_s Quality at 412nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-s quality at M1) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 412nm nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_a Quality at 445nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-a quality at M2) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 445nm (M2-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_s Quality at 445nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-s quality at M2) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 445nm (M2-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_a Quality at 488nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-a quality at M3) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 488nm (M3-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_s Quality at 488nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-s quality at M3) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 488nm (M3-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_a Quality at 555nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-a quality at M4) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 555nm (M4-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".

IOP_s Quality at 555nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-s quality at M4) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 555nm (M4-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".
IOP_a Quality at 672nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-a quality at M5) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 412nm nLw is out of the system spec range

IOP_s Quality at 672nm (Indicates pixel level IOP-s quality at M5) This flag is set to "Poor" if (1) The M5-Band RSR values indicate Turbid Water OR (2) The 672nm (M5-Band) nLw is out of the system spec range OR (3) Coccolithophores are present. A Bright Pixel also sets this flag to "Poor".
SDR quality for bands M1 to M7 (Any one band out of range is considered poor quality)
Input Total Ozone Column Quality
Wind speed exceeds threshold of 8 m/s (Whitecap formation)
Epsilon value is out of aerosol model range (eps < 0.85 or eps > 1.35)
Atmospheric Correction Failure (Indicates at which correction step the algorithm first fails)
Spare
Land/ Water Mask (Identifies the type of Earth surface that lies along the instruments line of sight - obtained from VIIRS Cloud Mask)
Snow or Ice in Pixel (from the VIIRS Cloud Mask)
Solar Zenith Angle =>70 deg (Day/Night Exclusion - Horizontal cell contains only nighttime. Solar Zenith Angle => 70 deg at center of horizontal cell)
Sun Glint detected in pixel as indicated in the VIIRS Cloud Mask
Exclusion - Horizontal Cell Size (HCS) > 1.3km (HCS > 1.3km, swath width > 1700 km or Sensor Zenith Angle > 53.0 degrees)
Degradation - Horizontal cell contains shallow water; Depth < 50 meters
Spare
Cloud Confidence Indicator (Indicator of whether 'M' band pixel confidently clear, probably clear, probably cloudy or confidently cloudy, from VIIRS Cloud Mask)
Adjacent Pixel is not confidently clear (as determined by the VIIRS Cloud Mask)
Thin Cirrus Cloud Detected in Pixel as determined by the VIIRS Cloud Mask
Exclusion: Cloud Shadow detected in Pixel (as determined by the VIIRS Cloud Mask
Non-Cloud Obstruction detected in Pixel (Heavy Aerosol) - as determined by the VIIRS Cloud Mask
Exclusion: Strongly absorbing aerosol detected in pixel (Single scattering albedo at M4 wavelength (555nm) <0.7)
Exclusion: AOT > 0.3 (AOT in horizontal cell > 0.3 on the slant path (AOT @865nm, M7))
Exclusion: Turbid Water detected in Pixel (Remote Sensing Reflectance (M5) > 0.0012)
Coccolithophores detected in Pixel : (nLw(M2)>=1.1 & nLw(M4)>=0.81 & Laero(M6)<= 1.1 & 0.6<=nLw(M2)/nLw(M4)<=1.1)
Exclusion: Dissolved organic matter absorption at 410nm > 2/meter
Range of Chlorophyll Concentration
Carder Bio-Optics Algorithm Branching (The various branching and model mixing within the Carder bio-optics algorithm)
Ocean Color values (any band) out of range 0= (1.0 <= nLw <= 40 W/m^2 micrometer sr); 1= out of range
Chlorophyll-a values out of range (Chlorophyll-a < 0.05 or Chlorophyll-a > 50)
IOP-a values (any band) out of range (IOP-a < 0.01 or IOP-a > 10.0)
IOP-s values (any band) out of range (IOP-s < 0.01 or IOP-s > 50.0)
Input Skin SST EDR Quality (Input Skin SST EDR Quality)
Exclusion - Bright Target Flag (The fraction of light into or out of cell exceeds threshold)
Chlorophyll Algorithm Branching
